name: Trailblazers
description: Get ready for high-speed thrills with an explosion of colour in Trailblazers, the first-ever second-to-second co-operative arcade racer. Paint the track with dynamic racing lines, boost on your team's colour and blaze your way to victory!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any compatible soundcard Additional Notes: Gamepad required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
